com.ebay.sdk.helper
Class ShippingServiceHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.ebay.sdk.helper.ShippingServiceHelper

public class ShippingServiceHelper
extends Object

A helper class to retrieve the available ShippingServices for a given site.
